exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0%nat Hp' : prime p Hp'' : (2 <= p)%nat Hzero_one : Zp <> Op n : nat Hn1 : (1 < n)%nat Hn2 : (n < p - 1)%nat H : forall x y, x <> Zp -> inv x = y -> y ⊗ x = Op Unable to unify "?M1476 ⊗ ?M1475 = Op" with "〚 1 〛 = inv 〚 n 〛".
The reference lia was not found in the current environment.

In environment H0 : forall p q k : nat, divides p q -> divides p (k * q) p : nat Hp : p = 0%nat -> False Hp' : prime p Hp'' : (2 <= p)%nat Hzero_one : Zp = Op -> False n : nat Hn1 : (1 < n)%nat Hn2 : (n < p - 1)%nat H : forall x y, (x = Zp -> False) -> y ⊗ x = Op -> inv x = y H1 : forall x y, (x = Zp -> False) -> inv x = y -> y ⊗ x = Op Unable to unify "(n < p - 1)%nat" with "exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) (rem 1 p) (div_rem_spec2 1 Hp) = inv (exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) (rem n p) (div_rem_spec2 n Hp))".
The reference lia was not found in the current environment.

original: intros. destruct H as (Hn1, Hn2). exists 1%nat. split. - lia. - apply Zp_invert_eq_not_zero. + apply Hn2. + apply Zp_inj. * lia. * reflexivity.
